name: HKWorkoutRouteBuilder
desc: A builder object that incrementally constructs a workout route.

items.name: init(healthStore: HKHealthStore, device: HKDevice?)
items.desc: Creates and returns a new workout route builder.

items.name: func finishRoute(with: HKWorkout, metadata: [String : Any]?, completion: (HKWorkoutRoute?, Error?) -> Void)
items.desc: Creates, saves, and associates the route with the provided workout.

items.name: func insertRouteData([CLLocation], completion: (Bool, Error?) -> Void)
items.desc: Adds route data to the builder.

items.name: func addMetadata([String : Any], completion: (Bool, Error?) -> Void)
